changeSet.author: nasir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE accounts ( id bigserial NOT NULL, account_id text, bank_id text, account_type text, institution text, currency text, CONSTRAINT pk_accounts PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: nasir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE transactions ( id text NOT NULL, type text, date_posted timestamp without time zone, amount money, name text, memo text, account_id bigint, CONSTRAINT pk_transactions PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_account_id FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION );
